articles.title: All you need to know: June solstice 2020 - EarthSky
articles.description: The June solstice is June 20. Longest day for the Northern Hemisphere. Shortest day for the Southern Hemisphere. Details here.
articles.content:
The sunset has been making its way north, as illustrated in this 2016 photo composite by Abhijit Juvekar.
